Uses of Interface
com.opengamma.strata.calc.config.MarketDataRules

  • Packages that use MarketDataRules 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.calc
    Calculate risk measures on trades, applies scenarios and manages market data.
    com.opengamma.strata.calc.config
    Configuration types for the calculation engine.

    • Uses of MarketDataRules in com.opengamma.strata.calc

      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.calc that return MarketDataRules 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MarketDataRules Column.getMarketDataRules()
      Gets the market data rules that apply to this column, merged with the default rules.
      MarketDataRules CalculationRules.getMarketDataRules()
      Gets the rules that define what market data should be used in each calculation.
      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.calc that return types with arguments of type MarketDataRules 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MetaProperty<MarketDataRules> Column.Meta.marketDataRules()
      The meta-property for the marketDataRules property.
      MetaProperty<MarketDataRules> CalculationRules.Meta.marketDataRules()
      The meta-property for the marketDataRules property.
      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.calc with parameters of type MarketDataRules 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Column.Builder Column.Builder.marketDataRules(MarketDataRules marketDataRules)
      Sets the market data rules that apply to this column, merged with the default rules.
      CalculationRules.Builder CalculationRules.Builder.marketDataRules(MarketDataRules marketDataRules)
      Sets the rules that define what market data should be used in each calculation.
      static CalculationRules CalculationRules.of(PricingRules pricingRules, MarketDataRules marketDataRules)
      Obtains an instance specifying all the rules, using the "natural" reporting currency.
      static CalculationRules CalculationRules.of(PricingRules pricingRules, MarketDataRules marketDataRules, ReportingCurrency reportingCurrency)
      Obtains an instance specifying all the rules.

    • Uses of MarketDataRules in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config

      Classes in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config that implement MarketDataRules 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AllTargetsMarketDataRules
      A market data rule which matches all calculation targets.
      class  TypedMarketDataRules
      Implementation of a market data rules that matches a target based on its type.
      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config that return MarketDataRules 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MarketDataRules MarketDataRules.anyTarget(MarketDataMappings mappings)
      Returns a set of market data rules that match any target.
      default MarketDataRules MarketDataRules.composedWith(MarketDataRules... otherRules)
      Combines these rules with the specified rules.
      static MarketDataRules MarketDataRules.empty()
      Returns an empty set of rules.
      static MarketDataRules MarketDataRules.ofTargetTypes(MarketDataMappings mappings, Class<? extends CalculationTarget>... targetTypes)
      Returns set a of market data rules matching any target which is an instance of any of the target types.
      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config with parameters of type MarketDataRules 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default MarketDataRules MarketDataRules.composedWith(MarketDataRules... otherRules)
      Combines these rules with the specified rules.
